summary:
Just a small modification to the Blackguard armor enchantments, mainly for myself.

Changes the Cuirass enchantment to the Linwe's Armor enchantment (increase stamina by 15), Gloves to the Thieves Guild Gloves enchantment (Lockpicking 35%) Boots to the Thieves Guild Boots enchantment (Pickpocketing 25%), and the Hood to Linwe's
descriptionHtml:
Requires Dragonborn DLC.
Can be a little hard to get working with SkyRe, just ask if you need a hand.

Just a small modification to the Blackguard armor enchantments, mainly for myself.

[b][size=5]Changes the Cuirass enchantment to the Linwe's Armor enchantment (increase stamina by 15), Gloves to the Thieves Guild Gloves enchantment (Lockpicking 35%) Boots to the Thieves Guild Boots enchantment (Pickpocketing & Lockpicking 25%), and the Hood to Linwe's Hood enchantment (15% bow damage).[/size][/b]

Best for thieves that use archery builds.

In the pictures I'm using a mod called Thieves Guild Armor HD Revival
author: nadiayorc

files.name: Modifed Blackguard Armor Enchantments More Powerful
